verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%>, Are <S%G1487><s%> <S%G686><s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> so <S%G3779><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G5346><s%> <S%G5713><s%>, Men <S%G435><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%>, hearken <S%G191><s%> <S%G5657><s%>; The 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> appeared <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto our <S%G2257><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> Avraham <S%G11><s%>, when he was <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Mesopotamia <S%G3318><s%>, before <S%G4250><s%> <S%G2228><s%> he <S%G846><s%> dwelt <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5658><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Charran <S%G5488><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Get thee <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5628><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> country <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> kindred <S%G4772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1204><s%> <S%G5773><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> I shall shew <S%G1166><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> came he <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5631><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of the Chaldaeans <S%G5466><s%>, and dwelt <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Charran <S%G5488><s%>: and from thence <S%G2547><s%>, when <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> was dead <S%G599><s%> <S%G5629><s%>, he removed <S%G3351><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> land <S%G1093><s%>, wherein <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> dwell <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, no, not <S%G3761><s%> so much as to set <S%G968><s%> his foot <S%G4228><s%> on <S%G968><s%>: yet <S%G2532><s%> he promised <S%G1861><s%> <S%G5662><s%> that he would give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5629><s%> it <S%G846><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a possession <S%G2697><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, when as yet he <S%G846><s%> had <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> child <S%G5043><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5656><s%> on this wise <S%G3779><s%>, That <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> should <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> sojourn <S%G3941><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a strange <S%G245><s%> land <S%G1093><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> that they should bring <S%G1402><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into bondage <S%G1402><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> entreat them evil <S%G2559><s%> <S%G5692><s%> four hundred <S%G5071><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the nation <S%G1484><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> they shall be in bondage <S%G1398><s%> <S%G5661><s%> will <S%G2919><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G5023><s%> shall they come forth <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5695><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> serve <S%G3000><s%> <S%G5692><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the covenant <S%G1242><s%> of b'ritmilah <S%G4061><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> Avraham begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Yitz'chak <S%G2464><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> circumcised <S%G4059><s%> <S%G5627><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the eighth <S%G3590><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> Yitz'chak <S%G2464><s%> begat Ya`akov <S%G2384><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> Ya`akov <S%G2384><s%> begat the twelve <S%G1427><s%> patriarchs <S%G3966><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the patriarchs <S%G3966><s%>, moved with envy <S%G2206><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, sold <S%G591><s%> <S%G5639><s%> Yosef <S%G2501><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%>: but <S%G2532><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> delivered <S%G1807><s%> <S%G5639><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> afflictions <S%G2347><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%> favour <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> in the sight <S%G1726><s%> of Pharaoh <S%G5328><s%> king <S%G935><s%> of Egypt <S%G125><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he made <S%G2525><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%> governor <S%G2233><s%> <S%G5740><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> a dearth <S%G3042><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt <S%G125><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Chanaan <S%G5477><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5707><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> sustenance <S%G5527><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when Ya`akov <S%G2384><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> that there was <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> corn <S%G4621><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%>, he sent out <S%G1821><s%> <S%G5656><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> first <S%G4412><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> time Yosef <S%G2501><s%> was made known <S%G319><s%> <S%G5681><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> Yosef's <S%G2501><s%> kindred <S%G1085><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> known <S%G5318><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%G5328><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5660><s%> Yosef <S%G2501><s%>, and called <S%G3333><s%> <S%G5668><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> Ya`akov <S%G2384><s%> to him, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> kindred <S%G4772><s%>, <S%G1722><s%> threescore <S%G1440><s%> and fifteen <S%G4002><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> were carried over <S%G3346><s%> <S%G5681><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Sychem <S%G4966><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> laid <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sepulchre <S%G3418><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Avraham <S%G11><s%> bought <S%G5608><s%> <S%G5662><s%> for a sum <S%G5092><s%> of money <S%G694><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Emmor <S%G1697><s%> the father <S%G3588><s%> of Sychem <S%G4966><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2531><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> of the promise <S%G1860><s%> drew nigh <S%G1448><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> had sworn <S%G3660><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to Avraham <S%G11><s%>, the people <S%G2992><s%> grew <S%G837><s%> <S%G5656><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> multiplied <S%G4129><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%>,

The same <S%G3778><s%> dealt subtilly <S%G2686><s%> <S%G5666><s%> with our <S%G2257><s%> kindred <S%G1085><s%>, and evil entreated <S%G2559><s%> <S%G5656><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%>, so that <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5721><s%> they cast out <S%G1570><s%> their <S%G846><s%> young children <S%G1025><s%>, to the end <S%G1519><s%> they might <S%G2225><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> live <S%G2225><s%> <S%G5745><s%>.

In <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> exceeding <S%G2316><s%> fair <S%G791><s%>, and <S%G3739><s%> nourished up <S%G397><s%> <S%G5648><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father's <S%G3962><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> months <S%G3376><s%>:

And <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> was cast out <S%G1620><s%> <S%G5685><s%>, Pharaoh's <S%G5328><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%> took <S%G337><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G337><s%> <S%G5639><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> nourished <S%G397><s%> <S%G5668><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> her own <S%G1438><s%> son <S%G5207><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> was learned <S%G3811><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of the Egyptians <S%G124><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> mighty <S%G1415><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was full <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5712><s%> forty years <S%G5063><s%> old <S%G5550><s%>, it came <S%G305><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> to visit <S%G1980><s%> <S%G5664><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of them suffer wrong <S%G91><s%> <S%G5746><s%>, he defended <S%G292><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him, and <S%G2532><s%> avenged <S%G1557><s%> <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him that was oppressed <S%G2669><s%> <S%G5746><s%>, and smote <S%G3960><s%> <S%G5660><s%> the Egyptian <S%G124><s%>:

For <S%G1161><s%> he supposed <S%G3543><s%> <S%G5707><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> would have understood <S%G4920><s%> <S%G5721><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> that 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> would deliver <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5719><s%> <S%G4991><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> they understood <S%G4920><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> the next <S%G1966><s%> <S%G5752><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he shewed himself <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> as they strove <S%G3164><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> would have set <S%G4900><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> one again <S%G1515><s%>, saying <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, Sirs <S%G435><s%>, ye <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5748><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>; why <S%G2444><s%> do ye wrong <S%G91><s%> <S%G5719><s%> one to another <S%G240><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> he that did <S%G91><s%> his neighbour <S%G4139><s%> wrong <S%G91><s%> <S%G5723><s%> thrust <S%G683><s%> him <S%G846><s%> away <S%G683><s%> <S%G5662><s%>, saying <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> made <S%G2525><s%> <S%G5656><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> a ruler <S%G758><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a judge <S%G1348><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>?

Wilt <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> kill <S%G337><s%> <S%G5629><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, as <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5158><s%> thou diddest <S%G337><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the Egyptian <S%G124><s%> yesterday <S%G5504><s%>?

Then <S%G1161><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> <S%G5627><s%> Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> a stranger <S%G3941><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Madian <S%G3099><s%>, where <S%G3757><s%> he begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when forty <S%G5062><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> were expired <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5685><s%>, there appeared <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5681><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> of mount <S%G3735><s%> Sina <S%G4614><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> in a bush <S%G942><s%>.

When <S%G1161><s%> Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> it, he wondered <S%G2296><s%> <S%G5656><s%> at the sight <S%G3705><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> as he <S%G846><s%> drew near <S%G4334><s%> <S%G5740><s%> to behold <S%G2657><s%> <S%G5658><s%> it, the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,

Saying, I <S%G1473><s%> am the 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> of Avraham <S%G11><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> of Yitz'chak <S%G2464><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> of Ya`akov <S%G2384><s%>. Then <S%G1161><s%> Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> trembled <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> <S%G1790><s%>, and durst <S%G5111><s%> <S%G5707><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> behold <S%G2657><s%> <S%G5658><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>, Put off <S%G3089><s%> <S%G5657><s%> thy shoes <S%G5266><s%> from thy <S%G4675><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> thou standest <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5758><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> ground <S%G1093><s%>.

I have seen <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, I have seen <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the affliction <S%G2561><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I have heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> their <S%G846><s%> groaning <S%G4726><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> am come down <S%G2597><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to deliver <S%G1807><s%> <S%G5641><s%> them <S%G846><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> come <S%G1204><s%> <S%G5773><s%>, I will send <S%G649><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%>.
